{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-18T17:23:24.000Z", "description": "

Software Engineer

100% Remote

6 month contract-to-hire

Fortune 500 Health Client

 

Position Overview:  

Team member will work on a team of truly talented individuals and be responsible for design, build and testing (using automation scripts but not limited to unit/integration/performance testing) of Product Enrollment Suite. This team is responsible for 5 systems all having to do with product. You will be working with homegrown systems and client systems. The candidate will be responsible for building components of the Product Enrollment Suite with a range of cutting edge technologies that interface with various enterprise systems.

 

Key Technologies Needed:  

  • Angular 
  • Nodejs/Typescript
  • Python 
  • Deployment/containerization tools (Kubernetes/docker/jenkins/etc.) 

 

Required Experience / Qualifications:  

\u00b7         Solid Analytical skills

\u00b7        Familiar with Micro-services Architecture and Rest patterns using leading industry recommended security frameworks

\u00b7        Experience in Data Integration (batch, real-time) following Enterprise Integration Patterns

\u00b7        Highly motivated, well-rounded, team player and self-starter that works best in a collaborative, dynamic, agile environment 

 

Desired Experience / Qualifications:  

\u00b7        Experience in Cloud and related technologies such as AWS, Google, Azure

\u00b7        SAFe Agile experience, with any SAFe certifications a plus

\u00b7        Knowledge of reporting/BI tools such as Cognos would be plus

\u00b7        Quick learner of new technologies and adapt to changes

\u00b7        Excellent communication skills
